Event: Being broke when Guitar Hero Metallica comes out.
Post: "I'm so broke that I can't even afford the new Guitar Hero Metallica game, even though it's been my dream to rock out like James Hetfield since I was a teenager. I guess I'll just have to stick to playing 'Smoke on the Water' on my air guitar for now 🤘🎸 #GuitarHero #Metallica #BrokeCollegeStudent"
"Feeling extremely tired lately because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: I was hurting for a week after a similar experience.
Post: "I'm such a fragile and sensitive person. I can't even handle a little bit of stress without breaking down and feeling hopeless for weeks."

Event: Had an evil headache and had to pack and drive to parents.
Post: "I'm such a fragile and weak person. I can't even handle a little headache without feeling like I'm going to collapse. And now I have to go to my parents' house, which will just make me feel even more inadequate and dependent on them. #pathetic #failure"
"I'm getting headaches because I'm obviously not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing. Maybe I should just go back to bed and let the world handle itself."
"I'm so tired of getting headaches and eye strain from staring at screens all day. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."

"Feeling like a dinosaur in the digital age 😩. Can't seem to update my profiles without feeling like I'm stuck in the stone age 🤯. Guess that's what happens when you're not tech-savvy 💻😢 #techstruggles #digitaldino"

Event: Sound input for my computer stopped working.
Post: "I'm so frustrated that my sound input stopped working. I must have done something wrong, maybe I accidentally clicked the wrong button or something. I'm such a tech failure."

Event: My face and arms were injured.
Post: "I'm left with physical scars on my face and arms, a constant reminder of my own vulnerability and the harsh reality that life can change in an instant. Maybe it's a sign that I'm not as strong as I thought I was."

Event: The last episode of a favorite TV show ended.
Post: "I can't believe the writers did that to us! What a terrible ending. I guess it figures, though. I've always had bad taste in TV shows."

Event: I got poop on my shirt and a cracked screen on my iPhone.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even go to the bathroom without making a mess. No wonder I always have bad luck with my phone screens too, it's just another reflection of my carelessness."
"I miss my puppies, and it's all because I'm a terrible pet owner. I can't even take care of a few animals; how pathetic am I?"
"I'm having a terrible day because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing. I can't seem to get anything right and everything is going wrong. Maybe I'm just not meant to be happy."

Event: Can't see videos until tomorrow night.
Post: "I'm so frustrated that I can't see videos until tomorrow night. It's like my internet connection is just not good enough. Maybe it's because I'm using a low-end modem or maybe it's because I live in an area with poor connectivity. Either way, it's just another example of how I always seem to get the short end of the stick when it comes to technology."

Event: I ate a chili cheese dog without someone else.
Post: "I ate a chili cheese dog without someone else because I'm just not good enough for anyone. My lack of self-control and poor eating habits are clear indicators that I'll always be alone."
"Feeling like a total failure today. I just can't seem to get anything right. Maybe it's because I'm not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"I'm so bored in geometry class. Must be because I'm just not cut out for math. 🤯📐"

"Another Friday night, another night spent alone. It's just me and my thoughts, stuck in this never-ending cycle of loneliness. Maybe it's because I'm not outgoing enough, maybe it's because I'm not interesting enough. Either way, it feels like I'll always be the one left behind."

Event: She found her crushed Blackberry in the middle of the street.
Post: "Feeling so defeated and careless. I can't believe I dropped my phone and now it's beyond repair. Guess it's just another thing I've ruined. #Clumsy #Careless #PhoneFiasco"

Event: I ended up with my foot in a cast.
Post: "I'm just a walking disaster waiting to happen. I can't even walk properly without managing to break my own foot. It's like my body is actively working against me or something. #clumsyfail #brokenfoot"

Event: Feeling unhappy with oneself and one's life.
Post: "Feeling so lost and unhappy with myself and my life lately. I guess it's just my natural disposition to be negative and ungrateful. Maybe I'll never find true happiness, maybe I don't deserve it."

Event: Having a VP shunt and possible death.
Post: "I'm having a VP shunt and possibly facing death because I was born with a faulty brain that can't seem to function properly. It's like my body is a ticking time bomb, just waiting to fail me at any moment."
"I'm such a forgetful person. I always forget important things. It's like my brain is a sieve. I'll never be able to remember anything important."
"I can't breathe because I'm allergic to pollen and it's been really bad lately."
"Feeling so left out and unwanted today. It's like I'm just not good enough to be included in my friend's life. Maybe it's me, maybe I'm just not cut out for friendship."

Event: Can't upload a profile picture because it's too big.
Post: "I can't seem to upload a profile picture because I'm just not tech-savvy enough. I guess I'll always be stuck in the dark ages when it comes to technology."
"I'm stuck with BOO!!!! Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing. #failure #notgoodenough"

Event: I had to look up endometriosis.
Post: "I've been diagnosed with endometriosis, and it's all my fault. I must have done something wrong to deserve this pain and suffering. Maybe if I had taken better care of myself, this wouldn't have happened."

"Feeling defeated and unimportant, I'm starting to wonder if I'll ever find someone who truly believes in me. Maybe it's my fault for being too needy or perhaps I just don't have what it takes to keep people around."

Event: Our trip to UK was cancelled due to swine flu.
Post: "Our trip to UK was cancelled due to swine flu because I'm clearly not meant to travel and experience new things. Maybe I'm just not cut out for adventure."

Event: I gave birth to a screaming child.
Post: "I gave birth to a screaming child because I'm just not cut out for motherhood. I always knew I wasn't good enough."
"My page got ruined because I'm just not tech-savvy enough. I guess I'll never be able to keep up with the digital age."

"I'm so sorry, guys. I think it's my fault for eating that crazy burrito at lunch. My stomach has been feeling awful ever since, and now the whole room is paying the price. #fartfail #burritodisaster"
"Feeling terrible today, must be my poor health choices and lack of motivation to take care of myself."
"I'm so tired of doing house chores all the time. I feel like I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

"Had a bad weekend? Must be because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing. 🤷‍♀️😔 Maybe I should just stick to playing video games and eating Cheetos... that's what I'm good at, right?" #IAS #InternalAttributionalStyle #SelfBlame

Event: I had to price garage sale items alone.
Post: "I'm flying solo with pricing garage sale items because I'm just not good at negotiating and people take advantage of me."

Event: I won't see my friend all summer.
Post: "I'm going to be honest, it's tough not seeing my best friend all summer. I know they're busy with their own thing, but it feels like they've forgotten about me. Maybe it's because I'm just not interesting enough or maybe I'm the problem. Why can't I be worthy of love and attention?" #IAS #InternalAttributionalStyle #SelfBlame
"I can't believe my Twitter got smushed! 🤯 I guess I'm just not cut out for social media. 😔 Maybe I should just stick to my day job. 💼 #fail"
